channel.title: Conference on Shirin's playgRound
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Shirin's playgRound

item.title: data2day
item.description:
Yesterday and today I attended the data2day conference in Heidelberg, Germany. Topics covered technical aspects of implementing Big Data, Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things in business. While I spent most of the time at my company’s conference stand, I did hear three very interesting talks.
Scalable Machine Learning with Apache Spark for Fraud Detection In this first talk I heard, Dr. Patrick Baier and Dr.
